title: Osmoclick
description: Gear up for Osmoclick, the thrilling pre-event of Osmoze'25, where your photography skills meet the essence of Banaras! Hosted by Society of Chemical Engineers and The Photography Club, IIT BHU, this online contest invites you to showcase your vision through the lens.
